ingredientStatement.text: Ingredients: Tomato Puree (Water, Tomato Paste), Diced Tomatoes In Tomato Juice, Cheese Blend (Granular, Semisoft And Fontina Cheese [Milk, Cultures, Salt, Enzymes], Water, Whey, Salt, Sodium Citrate, Lactic Acid, Natural Flavor), Sugar, Asiago Cheese (Milk, Cultures, Salt, Enzymes), Contains Less Than 1% Of: Salt, Canola Oil, Citric Acid, Parmesan Cheese (Part Skim Milk, Cultures, Salt, Enzymes), Roasted Garlic, Romano Cheese (Cultured Part Skim Cow's Milk, Salt, Enzymes), Basil, Spices.

productText.text: Prego® Fontina & Asiago Italian Sauce puts a cheesy twist on an Italian classic. Enjoy over pasta or with your favorite recipes!
productText.textHTML: Prego® Fontina & Asiago Italian Sauce puts a cheesy twist on an Italian classic. Enjoy over pasta or with your favorite recipes!

productText.text: Prego® Fontina & Asiago Italian Sauce puts a cheesy twist on an Italian classic. This bold sauce is sure to please everyone in your family. You'll love the way it perks up pasta and brings flavorful depth to your everyday recipes.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Fontina & Asiago Italian Sauce puts a cheesy twist on an Italian classic. This bold sauce is sure to please everyone in your family. You'll love the way it perks up pasta and brings flavorful depth to your everyday recipes.

productText.text: Prego® Italian sauces are made with sweet vine-ripened tomatoes and savory herbs and seasonings you can taste in every bite. Whether you’re in the mood for a zesty tomato sauce or a rich, creamy Alfredo sauce—Prego brings irresistible taste your whole family will love.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Italian sauces are made with sweet vine-ripened tomatoes and savory herbs and seasonings you can taste in every bite. Whether you’re in the mood for a zesty tomato sauce or a rich, creamy Alfredo sauce—Prego brings irresistible taste your whole family will love.
